mapper.update: update V_HIS_DEPT_INFO set DEPT_NAME = #{deptName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLINIC_ATTR = #{clinicAttr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OUTP_OR_INP = #{outpOrInp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INTERNAL_OR_SERGERY = #{internalOrSergery,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INPUT_CODE = #{inputCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where DEPT_CODE = #{deptCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select DEPT_CODE, DEPT_NAME, CLINIC_ATTR, OUTP_OR_INP, INTERNAL_OR_SERGERY, INPUT_CODE from V_HIS_DEPT_INFO
